Ping Inc. | San Francisco or Los Angeles| Full-time | $100k - $190K + equity | Full-stack Software Engineer |https://angel.co/ping/recruiting/listings

Awarded 2017’s LegalTech Startup of the Year by the American Bar Association, Ping is an enterprise SaaS company that automates timekeeping for lawyers and provides analytics on time and billing data for law firms. Ping recently completed fundraising led by an incredible group of investors including First Round Capital, Initialized Capital, BoxGroup, and Ulu Ventures. We’re growing our team with several engineering roles. Please visit our careers page on www.timebyping.com or message Kourosh (COO) at Kourosh@timebyping.com
